page.title: 08SIMON'S DAY IN HORNSEA
page.content:
I am{woken}by my father's shower, then step out of bed onto my Lego models. Mum makes the{breakfast}while I sit on the boiler and get{dressed. We take our next door neighbour{to {school}and we go{by car}and usually arrive just before the whistle. Usually we have some{sums}to do{before {assembly. On{Thursdays}I have{Library duty.}We look after our own shelves. I take {sandwiches}and eat them in the canteen. On{Wednesday}we have{Primary Singers for half an hour. In the{afternoon}we have{art}and{craft, drawing, sewing or {painting. When I go{home}at quarter to to four, my{tea}is ready and I can go out to {play}until{bedtime.}
Simon Firth
